de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Class AbstractSpatialDistanceFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractNumberVectorDistanceFunction
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractSpatialDistanceFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceFunction<NumberVector>, NumberVectorDistanceFunction<NumberVector>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcCosineDistanceFunction, BrayCurtisDistanceFunction, CanberraDistanceFunction, ChiSquaredDistanceFunction, ClarkDistanceFunction, CosineDistanceFunction, DimensionSelectingLatLngDistanceFunction, HistogramIntersectionDistanceFunction, HistogramMatchDistanceFunction, JeffreyDivergenceDistanceFunction, Kulczynski1DistanceFunction, LatLngDistanceFunction, LngLatDistanceFunction, WeightedCanberraDistanceFunction

    public abstract class AbstractSpatialDistanceFunction
extends AbstractNumberVectorDistanceFunction
implements SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
    Abstract base class for typical distance functions that allow rectangle-to-rectangle lower bounds. These distances can then be used with R*-trees for acceleration. This class is largely a convenience class, to make implementing this type of distance functions easier.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
